recipe_text: Quantity; 900; Prepare 900 grams of chicken wings| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of baking powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of honey| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of sriracha sauce| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of soy sauce| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 28; Measure out 28 grams of butter| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 120 degrees C (250 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Pat chicken wings dry with paper towels| Untimed; None; In a bowl, toss chicken wings with baking powder, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Arrange wings on a wire rack placed over a baking sheet| Untimed; None; Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes| Untimed; None; Increase oven temperature to 220 degrees C (425 degrees F)| Timed; 1800; Bake wings for an additional 30 minutes, or until crispy| Untimed; None; In a saucepan, combine honey, sriracha sauce, soy sauce, garlic, and butter| Untimed; None; Heat the sauce over medium heat until well combined| Untimed; None; Toss baked wings in the sauce until evenly coated| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Crispy Honey Sriracha Chicken Wings
